metadata.name: #1 The Mad Jackal
metadata.description:
A Genesis collection derived from the creator Ghost Kid. "Faces" includes horror-based artwork of the intriguing dark and ghastly aspects of this world. An homage to horror culture.

100 1/1 pieces will be minted and given, sold, or auctioned to the growing Ghost community who enjoy the darkness as well. 

*Ghost Kid tokens are not financial instruments or an investment. They are to be accepted as collectible one-of-a-kind artwork/art pieces from the creator that may grant exclusive access to certain benefits to the holders.

**Contract verified and created by Manifold.xyz
